WizardTD

类 Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
    Monster will be spawned in the game, and move along to path to the Wizard House.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

        public int getManaGainedOnKill()

        public java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> getDeathAnimation()
        Get the death animatopn of the monster.
        返回:
        monster death animation in a list

      • getHpPercentage

        public float getHpPercentage()
        Get the percentage of hp out of full hp of the monster.
        返回:

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int damage)
        Monster's hp will be decreased when it takes damage.
        参数:
        damage - damage taken

      • updateDyingImage

        public void updateDyingImage()
        Monster's image will be updated to its death animation when it is dying.

      • isDying

        public boolean isDying()
        Get whether the monster is dying.
        返回:
        monster dying status

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Get whether the monster is dead. It will be removed when it is dead.
        返回:
        monster dead status

      • setSpawnPosition

        public void setSpawnPosition()
        The spawn position of the monster will be determined based on the map layout. It will extract all 'X' at the edge of the map, and select a random point to spawn.

      • findPath

        public void findPath()
        Monster's path finding algorithm using BFS search. All the point 'X' that can be reached by the monster will be found first, and stored in a queue. These points have the attribute of the previous point pointFrom. The path finding starts from the end point (wizard's house). During the finding process, all points will be linked together. These point will be updated with an attribute of pointNext. The path stops when it reaches the start position, where it does not have a pointFrom. Then the starting point of the monster will be set as currentPosition.

      • move

        public void move(float distance)
        The monster moves with a given distance value.
        参数:
        distance - distance to move each frame

      • hasReachedWizardHouse

        public boolean hasReachedWizardHouse()
        Check whether the monster has reached the wizard house.
        返回:
        whether the monster has reached the wizard house

      • banishMonster

        public void banishMonster()
        The monster will be banished when it reaches the wizard house and respawn at the starting position.
